        Parameters:

        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - in case there is an error in the configuration file. Note: if the configuration file doesn't exist, this exception is not thrown.

        Called from the CommandingImpl to add a command to the queue First the command is added to the command history Depending on the status of the queue, the command is rejected by setting the CommandFailed in the command history added to the queue or directly sent using the command releaser

        Returns:
        the queue the command was added to

        Called from external clients to change the state of the queue
        Parameters:
        queueName - the queue whose state has to be set
        newState - the new state of the queue
        Returns:

        cqm - the callback which will be called with updates

      • getSystemParameters

        public Collection<ParameterValue> getSystemParameters()
        Description copied from interface: SystemParametersProducer
        return the next bunch of parameter values. The values must contain a reference to a Parameter (i.e. parameter definition) and that Parameter does not need to be coming from the XtceDB - the provider can just make it up on the fly.
        Specified by:
        getSystemParameters in interface SystemParametersProducer
